H2.text: who founded the pittsburgh steelers in 1933. The University of Pittsburgh

H3.text: who founded the pittsburgh steelers in 1933. Rooney family

A4.text: The team was owned by Art Rooney and took its original name from the baseball team of the same name, as was common practice for NFL teams at the time.

A5.text: The ownership of the Steelers has remained within the Rooney family since the organization's founding.
